channel.title: Indian Economy: Read experts opinion and academic research on matters related to economy of India | Hindustan Times
channel.description: Indian Economy: Read opinion articles and in-depth analysis on issues related to economic policy of India on Hindustan Times. Know from the experts on various matters related to the economy of India like GDP, development, inflation, fiscal deficit, finance, trade, atmanirbhar, economic diplomacy, inclusive growth, socio economic growth, value chain, supply chain, taxes, Jobs, investment, stock markets.
